parameters.description: The ETag of the old product/edition. The value is used to prevent accidental overrides of edits to the product/edition made by other users. The value must be obtained from a previous API call made to get or update the product/edition.

200.description: Contents of a product in JSON format

name.description: The human readable name of the rule

anchor.description: A JsonPath expression indicating the object(s) to which the rule applies

lines.description: Names of all lines of the product

line_links.description: Line link definitions of all lines of the product

parentWorksetUid.description: UUID of the parent production workset

etag.description: The ETag of the old version of the resource/workset. Used to prevent accidental overrides of edits to the product made by other users. The value must be passed to all APIs which modify the same product in the If-Match header.

lockedBy.description: If provided, identifies user who has locked the product resource

LockedByUserInfo.description: User information on the resource locking user

explicitTypeName.description: Override for PCs entity type name for installed product. Optional, if not provided, we fall back to `code`.

effectiveTimeZone.description: Time zone of effective date field

expirationTimeZone.description: Time zone of expiration date field

segments.description: Segment values associated with the edition

Product type is deprecated for removal.  Determination of mono/multiline type should use `line_link` rules
instead.
